p: Annual total and age-specific population data were taken from the intercensal population estimates and land area and number of housing units were reported during the 2000 and 2010 Census; both datasets were available at the county scale from the U.S. Census Bureau. These data were used to calculate proportion of total population that are children (5-19 years old) and adults (20-69 years old), population density by land area, and estimated average household size.
